dcterms:creator: Ye Lyu
George Vosselman
Gui-Song Xia
Alper Yilmaz
Michael Ying Yang
dcterms:description: A specialized drone dataset containing a total of 420 (4K resolution) images from aerial views, split into sets for training, validation, and testing, with eight classes including Building, Road, Tree, Low Vegetation, Moving Car, Static Car, Human, and Clutter.
dcterms:title: UAVid

dcterms:creator: Michael Cramer
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating segmentation methods, specifically focusing on building segmentation in aerial imagery, containing 168 images split into training and test sets.
dcterms:title: Vaihingen Buildings
